mapper.update: update tb_person_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profile_img = #{profileImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable_status = #{enableStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_edit_time = #{lastEditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, name, profile_img, email, gender, enable_status, user_type, create_time, last_edit_time from tb_person_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select user_id, name, profile_img, email, gender, enable_status, user_type, create_time, last_edit_time from tb_person_info
